creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
[7] (number of the piece in the series)
Nakamaro's poem:
(Looking over the vast sky 
Here in China, far away from home
I can see the same moon
That I saw once in my hometown
Hanging over the Mikasa Mountain)
{Ama no hara
Furisake mire ba
Kasuga naru
Mikasa no yama ni
Ide shi tsuki kamo}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Illustrations of the Hundred Poems by the Hundred Poets (Hyakunin isshu no uchi)
title: Illustration of the Abe no Nakamaro's Poem
